versiculos.texto: Ne Papuru Kiritsitu Ketsutsi ni'arieya nekanihikitini mipai mitinakeki Kakaiyari, mipai mutayiki meripaiti kename tukari xuaweni Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hetsie tiwiyakaku.

nekamaniwairitiaka Timuteu pemineniwe nemimatsinaki'erie: Kakaiyari mita'ukiyari meta Kiritsitu Ketsutsi mitati'aitiwame 'aixia mekete' nekete'u'iyarini 'ahetsiemieme, mekematsinenimayaka meta meke-matsipitiaka 'a'iyaritsie pemika'uximatiariekaki.
Miki nepayexeiya Kakaiyari ne'iyari 'itiyakaku, ne'ukiyarimata ke- memiteheyexeiyakai. Miki pamipariyutsi nekanipitiaka nematsiha'eriwati nekatihayewati tukariki tikariki kepauka neminenenewie.
Yuheyemeki nepimatsiheuxeiyamiki nematsiha'eriwati kepemitiutatsuakakai pe'ahiwerieti, xika nematsi'uxeiyake nepinetemawiekakeyu yemeki.
Nepimatsiha'eriwa yuri kepemiti'erie yaki pekatikuxatati, mipai yuri tiuta'erieka meri 'apukatei 'akutsi Ruhira meta 'awarutsi 'Eunitsi. Yuri nepiti'erie 'ekita wahepai yuri pemiti'erieki.
'Ayumieme mipai nepimaraye'eritiwa pemikaratitimaiyaniki, pe'atatuati yaketineyurieneni Kakaiyari kemimatiupitia 'ahetsie ne'utimeku.
Kakaiyari kemitatiumi pikatatsi'upitia ta'iyaritsie temimamakaki, matsi pita 'iyari pitatsi'umi mitirikaiye, tatsipitiati temitetakanaki'eriekaki meta temitsetseiyeniki.
'Ayumieme pepika'atewiyani peti-hekiatati Tati'aitiwame hepaitsita, meta ne pepikanetsitewiyani, tsepa nemanutahiiya hetsiana nemimiemeki.
'Apita, 'ekita niuki 'aixia manuyinetsie mieme matsi ketinekwineni, petinewieti Kakaiyari matsitirikariyakaku.

Miki mitatsi'utawikweitsi kanihikitini kemi'ane mitatsi'uta'ini temipatsiekaki hetsiena miemeki, tita temiteyuriekai tame mikiki 'atsipikatiuyuri, matsi mipai mitiyuwairiyakaiki yikimana meta 'aixia mitiuka'iyariki. Mipai katiniuka'iy.
Tita pemitiu'eni netikuxatakaku tehekiatamete yumiireme wahixie, miki keniwayetuiri teiteri yamemitekahu, mikita memiyiwaweniki mipai memitewati'ikitianiki hipame.
Ketinekwineni 'ekita pe'amieneti Kiritsitu Ket- sutsi hetsiemieme, kuya 'aixia mitiuka'iyari hepai peyianeti.
Kemi'ane mikuya pikayuwiyania yu'uximayatsika kuwewieneti yikimana, matsi ninaki'aritiamikini kemi'ane mitahiawixi kuya mayaniki.
Yaxeikia nanautsame, kuruna pika'anutiketsiyarieni x...

Kene'ata'una pemikati'akahiwe'eriekaki temari wahepai, mipai pita ketine'amexiitiaka, heitseriemeki yapemitikamieniki, kepemaine yapemitiyurieneniki, pemiti'akanaki'eriekaki, miki memehiawe Ti'aitame wa'iyari 'itiyatikaikaku, miki wahamatia 'axeikia yaxeketeneyurieka 'aixia xemiteyuxeiyaniki.
Memikatemaiwawe niuki kememitexiatia 'at- simekatemaiti, miki kenexani'erieka mipai peti- maiti, niuki metixiatiame mepiyutakwini xeikia.
Kaneuyeweka kemi'ane Ti'aitame hetsiemieme miti'uximayatame mikayumieneni, mat...
Miki 'utiarikaki Kakaiyari tewiyari paye'ani piha'aritsieka 'aixia mitiyurieneniki naimeki tsepa kemititita.
Niuki kenekuxatani
Kakaiyari hixie, Kiritsitu Ketsutsi hixie kemi'ane 'itsikametiti miwatahiawe memayeyuyuri mikite yunaime, miki munuaximeki ti'aitametiti, mipai nema- tinihiritiaka:
Niuki kene'ayumiemetini kenekuxatani.
